name: A Maze In (itch)
description:
First person maze game

The mazes are simple at first and become more and more complicated as you unlock rooms, you can also unlock skills to help you find the exit and face unexpected events.

Features
  • Progress and unlock maze pieces.
  • Unlock skills that will allow you to progress more easily.
  • There is a virtual theme and a pirate theme which you will unlock later.
  • Current time to unlock all game content : approximately 3 hours.
  • Full game will have multiple themes, challenges, more events and skills.
  • Game is in early access. 
Streaming Permissions

Feel free to stream this game. When streaming, please include the title of this game and this URL on your video.
